content: this is a relaxed-fit cropped cardigan with no buttonholes to fiddle with the body is knit flat bottom up knit in one piece until the underarm split the sleeves are picked up and knit in the round and the only seaming is the shoulders any worsted weight yarn that meets gauge is suitable it can be knit longer if desired finished measurements with recommended positive ease of 6 - 10 inches 15 - 25 cm sizes - xs s m l xl 2xl 3xl bust circumference finished measurements 36 41 45 50 55 59 66 inches 91 104 114 127 140 150 167 cm total length 20 21 21 22 23 23 24 inches 51 53 53 56 58 58 61 cm
